--- title: "予測区間" author: "Nobukuni Hyakutake" date: "2025-02-21" date-format: "iso" categories: [Python] image: "mountain3.jpeg" --- ![](mountain3.jpeg) ## 予測区間 ::: {#739e2543 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import seaborn as sns import statsmodels.api as sm # assume X and y are the input and output variables X=[2,3,4,5,6] y=[6,8,10,11,12] #X = sm.add_constant(X) model = sm.OLS(y, X).fit() y_pred = model.predict(X) #y_pred_lower, y_pred_upper = model.get_prediction(X).summary_frame(alpha=0.05) y_pred ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` array([ 4.51111111, 6.76666667, 9.02222222, 11.27777778, 13.53333333]) ``` ::: ::: ::: {#fd862f76 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} model.get_prediction(X).summary_frame(alpha=0.05) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
